title: 1.4.3 Data Collection
intro: For the preparation of the status description here, two types of data were collected from institutional descriptions and details obtained from the National Census 2078, Agricultural Census, various surveys, Human Development Report, etc.
mainContent: Under institutional description collection, the work of collecting descriptions was done through questionnaires with the support and coordination of every ward office and various branches of the executive. Thus, in the context of collecting institutional descriptions, GIS Coordinates were taken to organize the source map and GIS Mapping.
